Title: Lo spazio bianco
Writer: Valeria Parrella (novel), Francesca Comencini (screenplay), Federica Pontremoli (screenplay)
Actors: Margherita Buy, Gaetano Bruno, Giovanni Ludeno, Antonia Truppo
Plot: An unexpected pregnancy and premature birth become a burden that Maria is unprepared for. Lacking control over events for the first time in her life, she retreats into an emotional space where she is alone, until the day arrives when she must learn to live again for her vulnerable child.
